body.p: This page is generated by Machine Translation from Japanese.

section.name: Overview
section.p: Here the search log. When you search in the search screen users search logs are logged. Search log search term or date is recorded. You can also record the URL, then you want the search results to.

subsection.name: How to display
subsection.p: In Administrator account after logging in, click menu search logs.

subsection.name: Search log list
subsection.p: Search language and date are listed. You can review and detailed, you click the URL.
